author: bencomic

left.text: man, i had the weirdest fucking dream ever last night.

right.text: his name was "salty", because he liked to be cleaned with salt.

left.text: i dreamt there was a parrot that couldn't fly, so they taught him to play the drums and he was REALLY good at it, so he went on the news
i think i must have bought him or something because next thing i know he's sitting on my shoulder, playing some drums

title: i'll find out where you live, salty (part 1)
